00004 #ifndef IonPhysics_h
00005 #define IonPhysics_h 1
00006 
00007 #include "globals.hh"
00008 #include "G4ios.hh"
00009 
00010 #include "G4VPhysicsConstructor.hh"
00011 
00012 #include "G4HadronElasticProcess.hh"
00013 #include "G4LElastic.hh"
00014 
00015 #include "G4DeuteronInelasticProcess.hh"
00016 #include "G4LEDeuteronInelastic.hh"
00017 
00018 #include "G4TritonInelasticProcess.hh"
00019 #include "G4LETritonInelastic.hh"
00020 
00021 #include "G4AlphaInelasticProcess.hh"
00022 #include "G4LEAlphaInelastic.hh"
00023 
00024 #include "G4hIonisation.hh"
00025 #include "G4MultipleScattering.hh"
00026 
00027 class IonPhysics : public G4VPhysicsConstructor
00028 {
00029   public: 
00030     IonPhysics(const G4String& name="ion");
00031     virtual ~IonPhysics();
00032 
00033   public: 
00034     // This method will be invoked in the Construct() method. 
00035     // each particle type will be instantiated
00036     virtual void ConstructParticle();
00037  
00038     // This method will be invoked in the Construct() method.
00039     // each physics process will be instantiated and
00040     // registered to the process manager of each particle type 
00041     virtual void ConstructProcess();
00042 
00043   protected:
00044    // Elastic Process
00045    G4LElastic*            theElasticModel;
00046 
00047    // Generic Ion physics
00048    G4HadronElasticProcess theIonElasticProcess;
00049    G4MultipleScattering   fIonMultipleScattering;
00050    G4hIonisation          fIonIonisation;
00051 
00052    // Deuteron physics
00053    G4HadronElasticProcess      theDElasticProcess;
00054    G4MultipleScattering        fDeuteronMultipleScattering;
00055    G4hIonisation               fDeuteronIonisation;
00056    G4DeuteronInelasticProcess  fDeuteronProcess;
00057    G4LEDeuteronInelastic*      fDeuteronModel;
00058 
00059    // Triton physics
00060    G4HadronElasticProcess      theTElasticProcess;
00061    G4MultipleScattering        fTritonMultipleScattering;
00062    G4hIonisation               fTritonIonisation;
00063    G4TritonInelasticProcess    fTritonProcess;
00064    G4LETritonInelastic*        fTritonModel;
00065   
00066    // Alpha physics
00067    G4HadronElasticProcess      theAElasticProcess;
00068    G4MultipleScattering        fAlphaMultipleScattering;
00069    G4hIonisation               fAlphaIonisation;
00070    G4AlphaInelasticProcess     fAlphaProcess;
00071    G4LEAlphaInelastic*         fAlphaModel;
00072 
00073    // He3 physics
00074    G4HadronElasticProcess      theHe3ElasticProcess;
00075    G4MultipleScattering        fHe3MultipleScattering;
00076    G4hIonisation               fHe3Ionisation;
00077 
00078 };
